text: I m probably going to do it tonight I have my suicide planned for today  April  st    I made a pact with myself a year ago that if my situation didn t get any better  that I d go ahead and off myself   Well  it s been a year  and to be completely honest  it s only gotten worse  College makes me physically sick and suicidal but my mom has convinced me that if I don t go any only choice would be being a deadbeat with no degree who would work minimum wage for the rest of her life  My family says they accept my lesbianism and yet they continue to try and find  the right guy for me  I can t live like this anymore   I don t know for sure how yet  but I assume hanging wouldn t be too hard to carry out  My mom has a death grip over my life and it s impossible to be happy while she still exists  I m   and I just want it to be over already  I want to fall asleep and then wake up as a brand new person with a new life   I m going to miss my friends a lot  I m sorry I worried you  you really meant a lot to me  I don t want anybody feeling guilty over this  it s for the best I just try and start all over again
summary: A year ago, she made a pact with herself that if her situation didn't get better, she would kill herself. College makes her physically sick and suicidal. Her mom has a death grip over her life. Her family accepts her lesbianism, but they continue to try and find the right guy for her.
